400.errorMessage: You are not authorized to perform this operation.
A discovery task is in progress. Please wait for a while and check the result again.
Unable to disable resource center while associate transfer is enabled.
ResourceCenter cannot be disabled, because the Config has been enabled.

404.errorMessage: The specified account does not exist.

409.errorMessage: ResourceDirectory management account or delegated administrator account has enabled multi account ResourceCenter, you cannot disable ResourceCenter.
ResourceCenter cannot be disabled because there are active delivery channels.
